description: The course considers at an advanced level the conduct of civil litigation in the federal and state courts, the impact of the policy objectives of the rules on the conduct of litigation, pleadings, trial preparation, evidence, settlement procedures, disclosure and preservation of evidence, service and jurisdiction, appeals.
restricted:
LLM; LLM (Adv), LLM(#16), LLM(#24); Applied Law students and students from a civil law background require permission from HOS. 
Quota: Minimum of 12 enrolments
